name: Blast Furnace
description:
Blast Furnace is a 2.5D metroidvania game that focusses on impactful gameplay through synchronisation of music and in-game events. The boss battle seen in this video is entirely directed through the music. This is made possible by a system that directs Unity through markers that are called from FMOD.

This prototype aims to see what effect the music has when the gameplay is heavily synchronised. Let us know what you think!

Xbox controls are shown in the game, but keyboard controls also exist:

To start the game: Spacebar
To skip the intro:  Escape
Move:  WASD
Jump: Spacebar
Block: CTRL or Right mouse click
Attack: Left mouse click
